dfstools 0.9.5
  • Reference

License: MIT

Getting started

  1. Read the code of conduct and contributor’s guide.
  2. Sign up for an account at MySportsFeeds.com. You will need an account to use this package.
  3. Sign up for monthly support of MySportsFeeds on Patreon. After you do that, they will activate your login / API token.
    • MySportsFeeds.com Patreon
  4. If you find this package useful, you can support my work on Patreon at https://www.patreon.com/znmeb/posts. Supporting me is not required to use the package!

Installing the package

  1. Install git, R and RStudio for your work environment. This is a developers’ release; for the moment, you’ll need to be familiar with git / GitHub, R and RStudio.

    I test regularly on Windows, Arch Linux and the Data Science Pet Containers toolset, but any environment that supports RStudio should work. If anything doesn’t work or the documentation is unclear, please file an issue at https://github.com/znmeb/dfstools/issues/new
  2. Open RStudio and install the packages devtools and roxygen2 from CRAN.

  3. In the RStudio console, type devtools::install_github("znmeb/dfstools").
